page.title: 19SUMMARY
page.content: The area is going through a transition from heavy to light industry.Soil samples are taken for testing to the regional chemical analysts working in laboratories in Daldowie sewerage works.Decisions are taken then about site development. Waste land has gone to industry,to housing and for landscaping.The main problem is rising unemployment during the transition. Pupils have problems about career choice.Will a preferred carrer have vacancies when trained? The area provides services to the city.We have substantial green belt. The nothern sector is now very beautiful on the banks of the Clyde.We hope that the proposed ring road will not interfere with the rural aspects here. This area of old Lanarkshire and new Glasgow is again "A Dear Green Place."
